abstract: Suicide bomber kills at least 23 people in Yemen at ceremony commemorating birth of Prophet Muhammad; no group claims responsibility, but attack is similar to others by Sunni extremists from Al Qaeda affiliate in country.
lead_paragraph: There were no immediate claims of responsibility for the attack at a ceremony for the Prophet Muhammad’s birthday in the southern city of Ibb.
snippet: There were no immediate claims of responsibility for the attack at a ceremony for the Prophet Muhammad’s birthday in the southern city of Ibb.

headline.main: Bomber in Yemen Kills at Least 23 at a Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Bomber in Yemen Kills at Least 23 at a Ceremony
